headerP1: Currently in my final year of a Bachelor's in Computer Science at Université Paris-Saclay, I'm someone who's passionate about code and always curious to learn new things. I built this site to share my projects, discoveries, and anything that might be useful to fellow tech enthusiasts!
headerP2: Here you'll find my work, along with articles about tools, tips, or concepts I wish I'd known earlier. Nothing too fancy—just hoping you'll enjoy exploring this space as much as I enjoyed creating it!
headerP3: When I'm not coding, you'll catch me traveling, listening to music, playing chess, or getting lost in video games. Always chasing creativity and good vibes.
